encodingDesc.p: The file data/letters/1880-9/1883/83-01-04a-final.doc was converted from Microsoft Word format into TEI using an XProc pipeline.

head.supplied: QUARTERLY ESTIMATE. ¶ To the Honorable ¶ ¶ the Chief Secretary ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the ¶ ¶ two months ¶ ¶ ending ¶ 28th...

div.p: Z83/148, unit 1403, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

note.p: MS written by G. Luehmann and signed by M.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the
two months ending 28th February 1883.

cell.style: border: 0.0069in solid #000000; padding-top: 0in; padding-left: 0.075in; padding-bottom: 0in; padding-right: 0.075in;

note.p: There is a ✓ against each amount in the 'Particulars of Vote' and 'Estimates previously approved' sections.

cell.p:
Total — Three hundred and forty six pounds thirteen shillings
and four pence

cell.p: Signature of the Officer authorized to certify to accounts Ferd. von Mueller.
